favourite.article: Baptist hymn writer and preacher, Beddome was born at Warwickshire, England. In his time he was one of the most respected Baptist ministers in the western part of England. He wrote a hymn every week to be sung after his sermon. After his death, 830 of his hymns were published. The best known hymn writer among the Baptists, his hymns are more popular in North America than in England. - Songs of the Spirit by Martin -------------- The original stanza 4 is slightly different: 4 Thus will the church below Resemble that above, Where streams of pleasure ever flow, And every heart is love.
